title: Why is AI making computers and games consoles more expensive?
description: The AI industry consumes vast amounts of energy, fresh water and investor cash. Now it also needs memory chips - the same ones used in laptops, smartphones and games consoles
content:
A machine making semiconductor chips
David Talukdar / Alamy
The latest commodity coveted by the AI industry is computer memory, and the sector is signing deals directly with manufacturers for billi… [+4188 chars]
